definition: to raise (animals)/to bring up (children)/to keep (pets)/to support/to give birth
line of business/industry/occupation/job/employment/school studies/enterprise/property/(Buddhism) karma/deed/to engage in/already

sentences.english: The falling of commodity prices influences poultry farming.
sentences.chinese: 的下降影響家禽飼養業。

sentences.english: Estimates suggest the cost to the poultry industry has been in excess of US$10 billion.
sentences.chinese: 據估計，家禽飼養業的損失已超過100憶美元。

sentences.english: Normally, this should be the task of the pig farming industry .
sentences.chinese: 通常來看，這應當是生豬飼養業的任務。

sentences.english: Without it, the farmers economy would never survive.
sentences.chinese: 如果沒有這種飼養業，農家經濟就無法存在下去。

sentences.english: And he promised that the government will help the villagers develop husbandry again in the future.
sentences.chinese: 他承諾政府將來會幫助村民重新發展飼養業。

sentences.english: Thefalling of commodity prices influences poultry farming.
sentences.chinese: 物價指數的下降影響家禽飼養業。
